'''1.6.11''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on January 30, 2015.

== Changes ==
* Installer now uses Java 8.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|561096640086700032|Our new installer uses Java 8, so that helps, but we haven't pushed people to use that - only new players have that right now.|January 30, 2015}}</ref>
* Executable downloads its own runtime; needs to be installed.
